title: English Speaking Proficiency Improvement Program for ESL Students Through Collaborative Interactive Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary English grammar and vocabulary comprehension
context.additional_context: Targeting undergraduate mathematics majors, with emphasis on strengthening practical English speaking skills required for job interviews and academic presentations

learning_goals: Learners perform fluent English presentations for over 3 minutes with 80%+ accuracy in mock job interviews after 6 months
Learners achieve the ability to respond immediately to at least five academic topic discussion questions weekly through collaborative activities
Learners achieve fluency score improvements of 15%+ in speaking performance assessments every 8 weeks by incorporating peer feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
